thread.title: It's not business as usual for Renaissance Hotels
thread.title_full: It's not business as usual for Renaissance Hotels | Examiner.com

author: Janet Arvia
title: It's not business as usual for Renaissance Hotels
text:
Play Actress and Grammy Award-winning musician Tia Carrere reveals how playing Mike Myers' love interest in 'Wayne's World' changed her life. on.aol.com Renaissance Hotels and Marriott’s Content Studio are getting into the motion picture business with Business Unusual, a 12-minute comedy co-produced by Substance Over Hype.
Following up on 2015’s Two Bellmen, the new short film is slated for an international multi-platform release on Q1, YouTube and other digital platforms. A limited theatrical engagement is also planned.
Business Unusual stars Yoshua Sudarso of Power Rangers , Jason Gerhardt of Mistresses , Grant Bowler of True Blood , Tia Carrere of Wayne’s World , and former NFL Receiver Brian Poli-Dixon with a cameo by former White Sox player Ozzie Guillen.
Written and directed by Daniel Malakai Cabrera and Caine Sinclair, the film is currently being shot throughout Chicago, on location at the Renaissance Chicago Downtown Hotel and, come tomorrow, on Wacker Drive.
